verses.kjv: Paul, and Silvanus, and Timotheus, unto the church of the Thessalonians which is in God the Father and in the Lord Jesus Christ: Grace be unto you, and peace, from God our Father, and the Lord Jesus Christ.
verses.ct: From Paul, Silvanus, and Timothy, to the church of the Thessalonians that belongs to God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ: May grace and peace be yours from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.

verses.kjv: We give thanks to God always for you all, making mention of you in our prayers;
verses.ct: We always thank God for all of you, consistently mentioning you in our prayers.

verses.kjv: Remembering without ceasing your work of faith, and labour of love, and patience of hope in our Lord Jesus Christ, in the sight of God and our Father;
verses.ct: We never stop thinking about your faithful work, your loving effort, and your steadfast hope in our Lord Jesus Christ, all done in the presence of God our Father.

verses.kjv: Knowing, brethren beloved, your election of God.
verses.ct: Brothers and sisters whom God loves, we know that he has chosen you.

verses.kjv: For our gospel came not unto you in word only, but also in power, and in the Holy Ghost, and in much assurance; as ye know what manner of men we were among you for your sake.
verses.ct: The good news we brought didn't come to you as mere words — it came with power, with the Holy Spirit, and with deep conviction. You saw for yourselves the kind of people we were when we lived among you for your benefit.

verses.kjv: And ye became followers of us, and of the Lord, having received the word in much affliction, with joy of the Holy Ghost:
verses.ct: You followed our example and the Lord's example by accepting the message despite tremendous hardship, yet with joy that came from the Holy Spirit.

verses.kjv: So that ye were ensamples to all that believe in Macedonia and Achaia.
verses.ct: As a result, you became a model for every believer in Macedonia and Achaia.

verses.kjv: For from you sounded out the word of the Lord not only in Macedonia and Achaia, but also in every place your faith to God-ward is spread abroad; so that we need not to speak any thing.
verses.ct: The Lord's message rang out from you — not just in Macedonia and Achaia, but everywhere. News of your faith in God has spread so widely that we don't even need to say anything about it.

verses.kjv: For they themselves shew of us what manner of entering in we had unto you, and how ye turned to God from idols to serve the living and true God;
verses.ct: People everywhere are already telling the story of how you welcomed us, and how you turned away from idols to serve the living and true God,

verses.kjv: And to wait for his Son from heaven, whom he raised from the dead, even Jesus, which delivered us from the wrath to come.
verses.ct: and to wait for his Son to return from heaven — Jesus, whom he raised from the dead, the one who rescues us from the coming judgment.
